答案: 📌 參考答案 (a) 男性的性染色體由一個 X 染色體和一個 Y 染色體組成。 The sex chromosomes of a male consist of one X chromosome and one Y chromosome. X 染色體比 Y 染色體大得多，因此容易辨認。 The X chromosome is much larger than the Y chromosome, making it easily identifiable. (b) 該染色體組型屬於體細胞。 This karyotype belongs to a somatic cell. 由於顯示出 23 對同源染色體，總共有 46 條染色體。 This is because 23 pairs of homologous chromosomes are shown, giving a total of 46 chromosomes. 體細胞具有兩套染色體，因此是二倍體；而配子只有一套染色體。 Somatic cells contain two sets of chromosomes and are diploid, whereas gametes contain only one set. (c) 母親的性染色體是 XX，而父親的是 XY。 The mother has XX sex chromosomes, while the father has XY chromosomes. 卵子只能含有 X 染色體，而精子則可含有 X 或 Y 染色體。 The egg can only carry an X chromosome, while sperm may carry either an X or a Y chromosome. 在受精過程中，後代的性別取決於精子攜帶的性染色體。 During fertilisation, the sex of the offspring depends on which type of sperm fertilises the egg. 若卵子與帶有 X 染色體的精子結合，便形成女性； If the egg is fertilised by a sperm carrying an X chromosome, a female is formed; 若精子帶有 Y 染色體，便形成男性。 If the sperm carries a Y chromosome, a male is formed. 因此，決定後代性別的是父親，而非母親。 Hence, it is the father, not the mother, who determines the sex of the offspring.
